solution_line_template: With 20 items per wash cycle, Alex will wash the clothes in {total_items} / {items_per_cycle} = {num_cycles} cycles.

With {minutes_per_cycle} minutes per cycle, the washing machine will take {minutes_per_cycle} * {num_cycles} = <<{minutes_per_cycle}*{num_cycles}={total_minutes}>>{total_minutes} minutes to wash the clothes.

As {one_hour} hour has {minutes_per_hour} minutes, the washing machine will take {total_minutes} / {minutes_per_hour} = <<{total_minutes}/{minutes_per_hour}={total_hours}>>{total_hours} hours to wash the clothes.
